Просмотр попадний в ангаре:
BattleHits This is a modification for the game "World Of Tanks" which allows you to show shots dealt by you
or to your vehicle in lobby
Менеджер реплеев:
Replays Manager This is a modification for the game "World Of Tanks" which allows you to convenient view 
replays, results, playback, and uploading replays to wotreplays site
Кастомизация танков:
Branded Tank Styles This is a modification for the game "World Of Tanks" that give gui and functional to fast
changes of tank Camouflage/Logo/Advert in hangar unto two teams.
